title: Donor Care Associate
excerpt: The Donor Care Specialist is responsible for the recording and acknowledgement of Africa Relief & Community Development (ARCD) constituents’ data and donations, as well as scanning checks and creating deposit information which feeds into the general ledger.

contents.body: The Donor Care Specialist is responsible for the recording and acknowledgement of Africa Relief & Community Development (ARCD) constituents’ data and donations, as well as scanning checks and creating deposit information which feeds into the general ledger. This position works closely with the ARCD Accounting teams, and ARCD Doner Care Team primarily, ensuring efficiency and timeliness in processing donor information and donations using best practice techniques to maintain optimal data integrity. This position plays a key role in maintaining database integrity and in maintaining donor communication and satisfaction through timely donor acknowledgement. This is an In-person position.

body: Responsible for the processing and posting of donation checks into the bank within 24 hours of receipt.
Responsible for receiving and processing credit cards, ACH, pledges, recurring gifts, and in-kind donations across multiple software platforms.
Conduct reconciliation following established audit-trail procedures for daily feed of gift entries into the general ledger.
Perform daily update and maintain the CRM system (Salesforce).
Perform monthly donation reconciliation with ARCD Accounting teams.
Maintain the Matching Gift process.
Responsible for on-line gift form creation and management to receive on-line donations.
CRM or donor database experience preferred.
Experience assessing and implementing system and policy protocols preferred.
Exceptional written and oral communication skills.
Extremely detail oriented.
Ability to maintain the confidentiality of donor information.
Ability to independently manage priorities.
Demonstrated ability to build working relationships with individuals of various ages, cultures, socioeconomic backgrounds, and abilities.
Ability and aptitude with Microsoft Office Suite and other technology necessary for successful day-to-day functioning in a business environment. Advanced knowledge of Excel is a plus.
Ability to work unsociable hours during peak campaigns.
Ability to communicate in Arabic and English.
Must clear nationwide criminal background check and driving record background check.
Associate degree, or vocational/technical school degree required: bookkeeping, data entry, computer sciences, accounting.
Bachelor’s degree preferred: computer science, management information systems, accounting, management
1 – 3 years relevant work experience required

title: Director of Development
excerpt: Our nonprofit organization is dedicated to making a positive impact on African communities by providing essential services and support to those in need.

contents.body: Our nonprofit organization is dedicated to making a positive impact on African communities by providing essential services and support to those in need. We rely heavily on fundraising to sustain our programs and services, and we are seeking a Director of Development to lead our fundraising efforts. Position Overview: The Director of Development will be responsible for planning and implementing a comprehensive fundraising program that includes major gifts, corporate and foundation giving, planned giving, and special events. The successful candidate will work closely with the Executive Director and Board of Directors to develop fundraising goals and strategies and will manage a team of fundraising professionals.

body: Develop and implement a comprehensive fundraising plan to meet the organization’s annual revenue goals.
Identify and cultivate major gift prospects, as well as corporate and foundation donors.
Plan and execute special events that engage donors and raise funds for the organization.
Manage and lead a team of fundraising professionals, providing guidance, training, and support as needed.
Collaborate with the Communications team to develop and execute effective donor communications and marketing materials.
Work closely with the President and Executive Director to develop fundraising strategies and goals.
Monitor and analyze fundraising data to evaluate performance and adjust strategies as needed.
Be primarily responsible for the implementation of Africa Relief and Community Development strategy plan.
Ensure the coordination, support, and oversight of all key elements of the development strategy including, staff, information, marketing, special events.
Provide direct leadership and technical support to a team working with major donors in various regions of the United States.
Work with the CEO and President to generate realistic fundraising targets as part of the budgeting process.
Provide regular and realistic updates to the CEO and President on fund raising trends and performance.
CRM or donor database experience preferred.
Experience assessing and implementing system and policy protocols preferred.
Exceptional written and oral communication skills.
Extremely detail oriented.
Ability to maintain the confidentiality of donor information.
Ability to independently manage priorities.
Demonstrated ability to build working relationships with individuals of various ages, cultures, socioeconomic backgrounds, and abilities.
Ability and aptitude with Microsoft Office Suite and other technology necessary for successful day-to-day functioning in a business environment. Advanced knowledge of Excel is a plus.
Ability to work unsociable hours during peak campaigns.
Ability to communicate in Arabic and English.
Must clear nationwide criminal background check and driving record background check.
Bachelor’s degree in nonprofit management, business administration, or a related field.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in nonprofit fundraising, with a proven track record of success in major gifts, corporate and foundation giving, and special events.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to write compelling donor communications and marketing materials.
Strong leadership and management skills, with experience managing a team of fundraising professionals.
Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with colleagues, Board members, executives, and volunteers.
Experience with fundraising software and donor databases.
A deep commitment to the mission and values of our organization.
